strTitle: Romantic Candlelight Dinner Overlooking the Rice Paddies

strIntroduction: Are you an incurable foodie who wants to explore the beauty of Balinese cuisine? Come on a food tour with me to hunt down and savour the amazing amalgam of Indonesian, Indian and Chinese flavours which make up this distinctive cuisine. Once you decide what dishes you'd like to taste, we can visit a range of restaurants, roadside warungs and night markets to get into the spirit of things! The list of typical Balinese dishes include: Babi guling: famous Balinese roasted suckling pig Betutu: seasoned steamed or roasted poultry (chicken or duck) - a specialty of Bali and Lombok Bubur Sum-Sum: rice porridge with palm sugar sauce and grated coconut. Bubur Injun (black rice pudding): black sticky rice with coconut milk. Bantal: packages of sticky rice, coconut, sugar and fruit (often bananas or sometimes orange rind or even mango essence Kopi Luwak (Luwak coffee): also called civet coffee or “poo coffee”. It is named after the practice of weasel-like animals called civets let loose into coffee plantations at night to eat coffee berries then poop out the coffee beans which are collected, washed and roasted over a fire Sate Lilit: spiced mince meat on a stick Sayur Urab:mixed salad Sate Susu (milk satay): a spicy spicy beef brisket satay prepared to be "milky" and served with hot chilli sauce. Popular in Bali and Java. Rendang: meat with coconut milk (Minangkabau: karambia) and a paste of mixed ground spices, which includes ginger, galangal, turmeric leaves, lemon grass, garlic, shallot, chili peppers and other spices. Nasi Campur: rice with various dishes Gado-Gado: a salad consisting of boiled vegetables served with a peanut sauce dressing.
strTitle: Eat your way through Bali

strIntroduction: Whether you're on your honeymoon or on a romantic vacation, indulge in a magical moment with your loved one with this luxurious dinner for two. Our five star resort is located at a unique spot in Bali's secluded southern coast, with dramatic cliffs and sheer drops giving way to priceless views of the Indian Ocean below. We have set aside 2 locations to create this special dinner for you (please indicate which you will prefer when you are booking this dinner) LOCATION 1. Our best view point, located in the top of our resort in a private corner facing the wide open Indian ocean. The perfect time to witness Bali's sunset is here at 6pm. LOCATION 2. On an island we construct on our cliff edge infinity pool, also facing the majestic Indian Ocean below. As the pool is closed at 8pm, we can only organise dinners starting from 8pm here. What makes this dinner special is our exceptionally romantic atmosphere at dusk. As the sun sets and you witness the dramatic sky before you, the lady will receive a single red rose and you can both admire the amorous rose petal decorations and candles surrounding your table. Our culinary team has created 3 special menus for couples, so pick your favorite from below and tantalise your tastebuds with their culinary creations. ***************************************************** OPTION 1: ASIAN MENU STARTER ‘Foie Gras’ Pineapple Ginger Compote, Rocket Salad Pine Seed Truffle Vinaigrette SECOND COURSE Asian Seafood Soup with Chili Tomatoes and Kefir Leaves THIRD COURSE Baked Sesame Tuna on Snow Peas, Mango and Thai Asia Sauce MAIN COURSE Crispy Pan Fried Sea Bass Fillet on Nori risotto with Wasabi Foam and Soya Reduction DESSERT Green Tea Coconut Cake with Mandarin Sorbet and Black Rice Tulips ***************************************************** OPTION 2: WORLD MENU STARTER Angus beef Carpaccio with Seafood Salad, Parmesan Shavings and Sauce Pistou SECOND COURSE Homemade Lobster Ravioli with Spinach and White Tomato Foam THIRD COURSE Barramundi Rolled in Parma Ham with Spinach Gnocchi, Enoki Mushroom and Green Lentil Sauce MAIN COURSE Veal tenderloin tiger prawn centeron turned vegetables and port wine jus DESSERT Amaretto Sabayon and Rum Raisin Ice Cream ***************************************************** OPTION 3 - EXTRAVAGANZA MENU Goat Cheese Crusted Lamb Loin with Rocket Salad, Sun-dried Tomatoes, Balsamic and Extra Virgin Olive Oil ***** White Tomato Cappuccino and Baked Scallop ***** Freshwater Javanese Crayfish Open Ravioli With Braised Baby Fennel, Bisque with Cognac & Orange Oil ***** Duo of Duck, Pan Fried ‘Foie Gras’ and Duck Breast with Celeriac Puree, Beetroot Potato and Truffle Foam ***** Karthauser’ German Dumplings Passion Fruit Sorbet Center, Vanilla Cream and Fresh Strawberries ***************************************************** OPTION 4 - VEGETARIAN MENU Grilled Portobelo Mushroom Salad with Parmesan Cheese and Fresh Arugula Salad ***** White Tomato Cappuccino with Basil Flavors and Vegetable Tempura ***** Spinach Gnocchi with Forest Mushrooms and Truffle Flavor ***** Vegetable Massaman Yellow Curry with Baby Potatoes and Cashew Nuts ***** Hot Chocolate Soufflé with Chocolate Sauce and Vanilla Ice Cream NOTE: In the case of rain, you will be allocated a private corner at our Rooftop lounge (on the 6th floor). All other aspects of the dinner will be remain the same (the set up etc)
strTitle: Romantic Oceanfront Candlelight Dinner at Uluwatu

strIntroduction: A must do snorkeling trip while you are in Bali. The pristine corals and warm waters are home to schools of vibrantly colored fish like the emperor angel fish, parrot fish, turtles, Morray eels in this areas. Marine Survey has revealed over 300 species of tropical fish around the island!! We have local snorkeling guides who will help you with your equipment and life jackets. Flotation devices will also be provided for those that are not so comfortable in the water. Our specially designated snorkeling areas make snorkeling in Lembongan a safe and enjoyable activity for all ages. The snorkel sites you will visit: 1. WALL BAY Famous for its excellent visibility of up to 40m+ on a good day. The highlight of your trip with healthy live coral reef, Big Fish like GT “Giant Travelly”, Barracuda and hundreds of fish of all shapes and sizes 2. JETTY The boat ride out to JETTY Nusa Penida is almost as exciting as the snorkeling trip itself, as it offers divers incredible views of the towering sea cliffs of Nusa Penida. Various Tropical Fish can be found and sometime Mola mola can be found here 3. MANGROVE BAY This snorkel site sprawling coral garden with plenty of fish and very light currents. You will see big sponges, nudibranch, mantis shrimps, cowries, cleaner shrimps & moray eels. Shoals of colorful anthias cover the corals, trigger fish, puffer fish, etc. ITINERARY: - 7.30-8.30 : Pickup from your hotel Lobby Kuta, Seminyak, Jimbaran, Nusa Dua, Uluwatu area. (7.30am if you are in Ubud area and 8.30am Sanur area) - 9.15 : Depart from Sanur by fast boat. - 10.30 - 12.30 : Snorkeling sessions at 1-2 different spots (approx. 30-60 min in each location) depending on the water conditions. - 12.30 - 13.30 : Lunch at the Restaurant on Beach - 13.30 - 14.00 : Mangrove tour using traditional boat - 14.00 - 15.30 : another Snorkeling Session - 16.00 : Depart from Nusa Lembongan by fast boat. - 17.00 : Return transfer to your hotel. LUNCH MENU : - Mineral Water during Snorkling trip - Seafood with rice (Vegetarian items possible on request) - Juice/soft drink If you are not a confident swimmer or don't know how to swim at all, no worries! Life vests are provided and our instructors will guide you to make sure you feel 100% safe and comfortable.
strTitle: 25% OFF One Day Bali Snorkeling Trip & Nusa Lembongan Tour

strIntroduction: The Gili Islands - Gili Trawangan, Gili Air, and Gili Meno are world famous for a myriad of diving and snorkelling opportunities. Snorkelling is easy from the sparkling white sand beaches and the crystal clear water makes it easy to see the beautiful schools of colourful fish ducking in and out of the coral. In order to get the best of these 3 beautiful islands, take an island-hopping tour with me to visit the best snorkelling spots around these islands. We will have our boat during this private day tour, so you will have complete flexibility with your party. If you are staying in Lombok, our day starts with pick up from your hotel in Lombok around 9am in the morning before we take a short drive to Telok Nara harbour for a 35 minute private boat ride to Gili Trawangan. If you are staying on one of the Gili Islands, I will arrange to meet you at a convenient location on your island at 10am (timing is flexible). Once we get into the water, I will show you my favourite spots to see the serene sea turtles which call this area their home. We can snorkel for as long as you like or even take a break with a quick stroll around Gili Trawangan (or Gili T as it is affectionately known). We spend the rest of the afternoon enjoying the great snorkelling and fantastic underwater paradise around all 3 islands where you can spend as much time as you like on each one and I will guide you to my favourite spots. Once you are hungry, we will have lunch on Gili Air at a restaurant overlooking the turquoise water before we depart around 3pm. NOTE: - If you will be staying in the Gili Islands already, please select the basic option called "Price per group (1 -2 persons) - from Gili Islands" and then add on the additional number of participants as necessary. - If you are staying in Bali, I encourage you to take the fast boat from Bali the day before our snorkel trip and I will meet you at Gili Trawangan directly
strTitle: Private Snorkeling Trip on Gili Islands to see the Turtles
